mapper.select: select id, user_id, oss_details, file_type, create_time, update_time from work_platform.download_info where id = #{id}
select id, user_id, oss_details, file_type, create_time, update_time from work_platform.download_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into work_platform.download_info(user_id, oss_details, file_type, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{ossDetails}, #{fileType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into work_platform.download_info(user_id, oss_details, file_type, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.ossDetails}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into work_platform.download_info(user_id, oss_details, file_type, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.ossDetails}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id) , oss_details = values(oss_details) , file_type = values(file_type) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update work_platform.download_info
user_id = #{userId},
oss_details = #{ossDetails},
file_type = #{fileType},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
